effect.name: Yadif Deinterlacer
effect.description: Deinterlace the input video ("yadif" means "yet another deinterlacing filter")
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.mode
Mode
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Send frame,Send field,Send frame nospatial,Send field nospatial

parameter.name: av.deint
Deinterlace
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Deint all frames,Deint interlaced frames only
